title: Ivan Losev (mathematician)
summary: Ivan Vadimovich Loseu (publishing under the name Ivan Losev; Belarusian Іван Вадзімавіч Лосеў, Russian Иван Вадимович Лосев, born 18 October 1981 in  Minsk, Belarus) is a Belarusian-American mathematician, specializing in representation theory, symplectic geometry, algebraic geometry, and combinatorial algebra.[1]
